survey_name: SaaS Platform User Onboarding Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate user satisfaction and identify pain points in the onboarding process of our SaaS platform to improve user experience and reduce churn.

questions.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with the onboarding process of our SaaS platform?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency and easy analysis. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How would you rate your overall satisfaction with the onboarding process of our SaaS platform?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'None of the above' to capture users who skipped onboarding.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes. Include 'Select all that apply' instruction.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you use? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How long did it take you to complete the onboarding process?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use time ranges that reflect typical onboarding durations. Consider adding 'I haven't completed onboarding' option if needed.

script.question_text: How long did it take you to complete the onboarding process?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of the onboarding process?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative insights. Limit response to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with character counter.

script.question_text: What was the most helpful aspect of the onboarding process?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any technical difficulties during onboarding?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to identify technical issues. Follow up with Q6 if 'Yes' is selected.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with conditional logic for Q6.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any technical difficulties during onboarding?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Please describe the technical difficulties you encountered during onboarding:
questions.routing_logic: Only shown if Q5 response is 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather detailed feedback on technical issues. Include example placeholder text like 'Please describe the issue and any error messages received'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with conditional display based on Q5 response.

script.question_text: Please describe the technical difficulties you encountered during onboarding:
script.routing_logic: Only shown if Q5 response is 'Yes'.

questions.question_text: How confident do you feel using our platform after completing onboarding?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure self-reported confidence levels. Important metric for onboarding success.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons with validation.

script.question_text: How confident do you feel using our platform after completing onboarding?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of these features were you able to successfully configure during onboarding? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Multi-select to identify which features users engage with during onboarding. Helps prioritize onboarding content.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with 'Select all that apply' instruction.

script.question_text: Which of these features were you able to successfully configure during onboarding? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How would you improve the onboarding experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather innovative suggestions. Consider adding 'No suggestions at this time' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text with optional character limit.

script.question_text: How would you improve the onboarding experience?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to a colleague based on your onboarding experience?
questions.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use 11-point NPS scale (0-10) to calculate Net Promoter Score. Include clear endpoint labels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons in horizontal layout for scale visibility.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend our platform to a colleague based on your onboarding experience?
script.routing_logic: This question is shown to all respondents.
